About WASHUN

[vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInDown”]

WASHUN Machinery is the leading manufacturer of stretch blow moulding machines, extrusion blow moulding machines, injection molding machines and plastic injection moulds in China.High-quality raw materials, matched with high-precision processing equipment, are carefully processed by senior engineers. 3000+ parts combine to form a durable bottle blowing machine.
Looking forward to your tasting
